        public int setCurrentPlayer()
        In GO black starts with the first turn. This method returns which ServerClient is black. This can set the currentPlayer to the right player at the client side.

      • isValidMove

        public boolean isValidMove(int row,
                           int col,
                           Stone stone)
        Determines if the move is valid. The field should be empty on the board. No stone may be played so as to recreate any previous board position.
        Returns:

      • finished

        public void finished()
        When the previousMove and currentMove are both equal to pass or the board is full the game will end.

      • isTerminated

        public boolean isTerminated()
        The game is ended when the game isFinished, playerQuitGame or timeOut.
        Returns:
        true if isFinished, playerQuitGame or timeOut is true.

      • isTimeOut

        public boolean isTimeOut()
        Should time the current player. When time is over the game is ended.
        Returns:

      • endResult

        public java.lang.String endResult()
        This gives the endResult of the game. When a player aborted the game then his or her score is 0.
        Returns:
